The Anji Xinyuan Coal Mine is an underground mine located in Anji Village, Guyang Town, Shouyang County, Jinzhong City, Shanxi province, China

operators: Shanxi Guxian Anji Xinyuan Coal Industry
owners: Guxian State Owned Capital Investment and Operation Company
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Shanxi Guxian Anji Xinyuan Coal Industry, which is fully owned by Guxian State Owned Capital Investment and Operation Company.
